sen.j: 西園寺 公名（さいおんじ きんな、応永17年（1410年） - 応仁2年5月22日 (旧暦)（1468年6月12日））は室町時代の公卿。
sen.e: Kinna SAIONJI (1410-June 12, 1468) was a court noble in the Muromachi period.
Kinna SAIONJI (1410-June 12, 1468) was a court noble in the Muromachi period.
Kinna SAIONJI (1410 - June 21, 1468) was a Kugyo (high court noble) in the Muromachi period.
sen.cmt: 1410-June 12 を1410 - June 21 に修正しました。court noble をKugyo (high court noble) に修正しました。

sen.e: His father was Sanenaga SAIONJI.
His father was Sanenaga SAIONJI.
His father was Sanenaga SAIONJI.
His mother was a daughter of Motochika JIMYOIN.
His mother was a daughter of Motochika JIMYOIN.
His mother was a daughter of Motochika JIMYOIN.
Sanetoo SAIONJI was one of his children.
Sanetoo SAIONJI was one of his children.
Sanetoo SAIONJI was one of his children.
sen.cmt: Sanetoo をSaneto に修正しました（※）。※用語集では Sanetoo となっていますが、指示書では長音の場合母音を重ねない旨の表記がありましたので、上記のとおり修正しました。

sen.e: His homyo (a name given to a person who enters the Buddhist priesthood) was Eizon.
His Buddhist name was Eizon.
His Buddhist name was Eizon.
His dogo (a pseudonym as a priest) was Kikuen.
His dogo (a priest's pseudonym) was Kikuen.
His dogo (a priest's pseudonym) was Kikuen.
His pen name was Shokoku KANONJI.
His pen name was Shokoku KANONJI.
His pen name was Shokoku KANONJI.

tit.cmt: personal history をPersonal History に修正しました。

sen.j: 応永17年（1410年）に西園寺実永の子として生まれる。
sen.e: In 1410, he was born as the child of Sanenaga SAIONJI.
In 1410, he was born as the child of Sanenaga SAIONJI.
In 1410, he was born as the child of Sanenaga SAIONJI.

sen.j: 応永27年（1420年）12月5日 (旧暦)に参議となる。
sen.e: On December 5, 1420, he became a Sangi (councilor).
On December 5, 1420, he became a Sangi (councilor).
On January 17, 1421, he became a Sangi (Royal Advisor).
sen.cmt: December 5, 1420 をJanuary 17, 1421 に修正しました。councilor をRoyal Advisor に修正しました。

sen.e: In 1438, he became a minister of the center (1438-1441).
In 1438, he became a minister of the center (1438-1441).
In 1438, he became Naidaijin (Minister of the Center) (1438-1441).
sen.cmt: a minister of the center をNaidaijin (Minister of the Center) に修正しました。

sen.j: 宝徳2年（1450年）4月25日 (旧暦)、叙従一位。
sen.e: On April 25, 1450, he was appointed to Juichii (Junior First Rank).
On April 25, 1450, he was appointed to Juichii (Junior First Rank).
On June 14, 1450, he was appointed to Juichii (Junior First Rank).
sen.cmt: April 25 をJune 14 に修正しました。

sen.j: 康正元年（1455年）に太政大臣（1455年 - 1457年）となる。
sen.e: In 1455, he became Daijo-daijin (Grand minister of state) (1455-1457).
In 1455, he became Daijo-daijin (Grand minister of state) (1455-1457).
In 1455, he became Daijo daijin (Grand minister of state) (1455-1457).
sen.cmt: Daijo-daijin のハイフンを削除しました。

sen.j: 長禄元年（1457年）8月28日 (旧暦)に出家。
sen.e: On August 28, 1457, he became a priest.
On August 28, 1457, he became a priest.
On September 25, 1457, he became a priest.
sen.cmt: August 28 をSeptember 25 に修正しました。

sen.e: In 1468, he passed away.
In 1468, he passed away.
In 1468, he passed away.
